files.patch:
@@ -106,0 +106,3 @@ + *
  • "cu" + * ( + * Currency Type) - Overrides the Currency used @@ -108,2 +111,2 @@ - * If both "nu" and "rg" are specified, the decimal digits from the "nu" - * extension supersedes the implicit one from the "rg" extension. + * For both "nu" and "cu", if they are specified in addition to "rg", the respective + * values from the "nu" and "cu" extension supersede the implicit ones from the "rg" extension.
